revised_title: Description of the Narhual: An Unusual Fish with a Horn
tldr: The author describes the discovery of a large, previously unknown fish called the Narhual in the Beluhmer Wadt Creek, belonging to the Duchy of Bremen. The Narhual has a unique feature of a six-foot-long, ivory-white horn on its forehead. The fish has a smooth, white body with black spots, small head, and eyes, and two black fins on its neck. This discovery expands the knowledge of marine life and unusual animals.
